mapper.select: SELECT A.SHOES_NO , A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , A.SHOES_MODEL , A.SHOES_PRICE , A.SALES_YN , A.SALES_AMOUNT , A.REAMANING_AMOUNT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.WINNER_DATE , A.EVENT_END_YN FROM SHOES_INFO A LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY B ON (A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY A.SHOES_NO DESC

SELECT A.SHOES_NO , A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , A.SHOES_MODEL , A.SHOES_PRICE , A.SALES_YN , A.SALES_AMOUNT , A.REAMANING_AMOUNT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.WINNER_DATE , A.EVENT_END_YN , C.SHOES_THUMB_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.FILE_TYPE , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM SHOES_INFO A LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY B ON (A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SHOES_THUMB C ON (A.SHOES_NO = C.ST_NO) WHERE A.SHOES_NO = #{ shoesNo }
